features: Travel Comfortably - Long flights can be uncomfortable for many reasons. We’re here to solve at least one of them. With our airplane travel essentials and travel-sized airplane footrest, you can give your feet and lower-back the vacation they deserve. Who needs 1st Class anyways? With our travel foot rest and long flight essentials you can kick your feet up and relax wherever you go. Add a foot hammock to your list of travel essentials today.

Three Different Positions - Your new airplane foot rest is straightforward to use. It has an extra-long adjustable strap. Travelers of any height can find comfort with our foot rest for airplane travel. Simply wrap your plane foot rest around the seat tray in front of you, and adjust the strap to your desired length. Place your feet in your new comfy airplane foot hammock airplane, relax, and settle in for a smooth flight!

Suitable for All Travelers - Many times, a footrest hammock is too short, even for a small child. We specially design our airplane accessories to accommodate travelers of all sizes - even kids. It's so compatible, in fact, that you can use your foot sling for airplane travel on planes and trains. Some of our customers even hang their foot rest airplane hammock in the car! Our airplane footrest is guaranteed to provide you with comfort, whether you're 4ft or 7ft tall.

Your New Favorite Travel Accessory - Your new leg rest for airplane travel will arrive in a convenient travel bag. Each foot hammock under desk is evenly-padded for ultimate comfort. The extra-long adjusts from 17"to 34” and has a depth of 9” with an 18” width. You'll have plenty of space to relax. Plus, you can use your new foot hanger for plane travel on any flight without disturbing the person in front of or next to you! This is one of the best airplane travel accessories you'll find.

Based in the USA - Our goal is to offer travel essentials for women and men that make your life easier. Our foot hammock does just that. Buy with confidence knowing your travel footrest for airplane use is coming from an American-based company based right here in Jacksonville, FL, USA. We care about you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So simple. So good.
reviews.reviewText: I just used this on an 11 hour flight, and it was a total game changer.So simple to use: slide it over the tray table and then put your feet up. I was able to stretch out my legs, and keep them raised and supported. I fly a lot and my hips usually feel tight, but this is a much more comfortable sitting position and no stiffness.I’m 5’6’’ and the fit was perfect. It’s good quality and comes in a handy little storage pouch. A nice little buy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure what to expect with this product since several reviews mentioned they didn't think the foot hammock did anything for them. The price is reasonable enough I figured I would give them a try for my 9 hour overseas flight, as I struggle with serious hip pain from sitting for hours if my feet aren't up. First off, this was so easy to use. It doesn't take up any extra room in the already cramped area you get on a plane. Secondly, it was very easy to adjust the hammock to fit my needs perfectly.I have never had a more comfortable plane ride in my entire life. I don't think I can ever fly without this hammock.I am very short, so it's just not comfortable for me to fly without having my feet up. With the hammock I had zero hip pain and was so comfy i was able to go right to sleep. I gave the other one to my dad to use on our flight and he agreed this is a game changer for flying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We were recently on a plane for 9 hours and I used these to keep my legs moving during the flight. Once installed you can swing your legs back and forth which was so helpful. My legs usually go to sleep or I have to cross and uncross my legs to get comfortable. But you can adjust the height of the foot rest so that made it very comfortable.The one draw back was that both feet would sink to the middle and would scrunch together. There are other options with a solid bottom to keep your legs separated- if I were shopping, I would try those out. The drawback to the solid bottom version is the packing- the soft ones are easy to fold and pack. I’m not sure how easy it would be to pack the hard bottomed version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Helps with leg room, but feet get squished
reviews.reviewText: Other reviews mentioned that your feet get squished together, but I thought it wasn't a big deal. I bought this for two 10-11 hour long flights. Honestly, my feet got numb from being squished together. It did help give me a variety of leg room options, which on a long flight was nice. But I couldn't use it consistenyl for the whole flight (or more than an hour at a time). Decent for the price, but not for long-term comfot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loves it! It makes me feel so comfortable because I'm kind of short so my legs are always kind of hanging in the air plains, this was a life changer for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO WORTH IT
reviews.reviewText: I use this every time I go on long flights (like 20 hour long flights) and trust me, this makes economy so much more comfortable. This is 100% worth every penny. It's easy to set up, put away, and just makes flying more enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Way to Go
reviews.reviewText: I'm pretty short, 5'1, and there have been instances where my feet have dangled uncomfortably above or just above the ground. I am also someone who sits most comfortably with my feet tucked up but I don't like the idea of kicking the back of the chair in front of me while I'm shifting and disturbing other passengers. This foot hammock was fantastic for finding solutions to all of the above. It is compact and comes in a travel pouch. It is easy to set up even with people sitting next to you and it is easy to adjust to as long or as short as you would like. If you are interested in buying this type of product I would highly recommending purchasing this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the idea of this, therefore I bought two for a 10 hour flight for my partner and I. You slide the strap between the seat and the tray and it dangles down. If you fidget too much, it’ll definitely disturb the person’s seat in front of you. It takes a hot minute to get the height adjustment right because inevitably you’ll have a bag under your seat and that cuts into your hammock space. I don’t know if I’ll use it again, and my partner ended up not being interested in using it because of disturbing to person in front. Otherwise, it’s sturdy and I wasn’t afraid of breaking it, and it’s moderately comfortable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cómodo y práctico para un largo viaje
reviews.reviewText: Pedí este producto para usarlo en un vuelo largo de LA a China, me ayudó mucho para no cansarme tanto las piernas.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really helps alleviate leg cramps and knee pain during flight
reviews.reviewText: I used this on a couple of four-hour cross-country flights and found it to be great. A caveat to that, though - I was in premium economy, with more legroom than regular economy, so my review is based on that experience. The strap for the hammock fit nicely over my tray table, either with it open or closed. The padded part, where your legs go, was durable and comfortable and the strap was easily adjustable so I could get it to a comfortable angle. The carrying case is a great "extra" and really makes it easy to pack into a carryon without having to worry about hammock getting damaged or the strap getting tangled.I was on a night flight on the way out, and found it helped my sleep having my legs stretched out and a bit higher than if I'd just stretched them out under the seat in front of me or slept while in a sitting position. Coming back I was working on my computer, and having my legs elevated made the flight a lot more comfortable. My knees didn't hurt nearly as bad as when I usually get up after sitting for a long while, and it was easy to get my feet in and out of the hammock when I needed a bathroom break without having to detach it from the table first.
So comfortable, easy to slip over the tray table. Usually I can't sleep, even on 10+ hour flights, finally solved.note. I'm only 5'3.

reviews.reviewTitle: Didn't fit my needs but good product
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the product is good and it would work well on a plane. I had to return it because I bout for office use and couldn't attach it to my 5 foot desk in a useable manner. Love the idea of them and the price point is great for a set of two.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for long flights/ Genial para viajes largos
reviews.reviewText: This saved me on a recent 6 hour flight follow es by the longest of 14 hours. Your knees will thank you! Esto me salvó en un vuelo reciente de 6 horas seguido de otro larguísimo de 14 horas. Sus rodillas se los agradecerán!
